Name: Pariah
Flavor: Ranged Undead unit. Deals magic damage.
Description: An undead with corrupt magics running through its digestive tract. Makes a real gross 'hkkkkkpTOO' sound and spits acid in order to attack.

Attacks.Attack Description: The Pariah hawks a mean, magical loogie at its target. Burns flesh and ruins clothes. Deals light magical damage.
